dct_title_s: The world on Mercator's projection : Western part
dct_description_sm: Relief shown by hachures. Shows explorers' routes and dates of discoveries. At head of map: Pinkerton's modern atlas. Probably issued in: A modern atlas, from the latest and best authorities. Philadelphia : Thomas Dobson, 1818.
